method: Preheat the oven to 170C/3325F/Gas 3. Mix the cabbage with the rest of the ingredients and put in an ovenproof dish. Season well and cover with foil.  Bake in the oven for 60-90 minutes until the cabbage is tender and juicy. Mix the ingredients together 2-3 times during cooking. Allow to cool and store in the fridge. Reheat when needed.
ingredients: 1 medium red cabbage, quartered, cored and sliced,  2 red onions, peeled and sliced,  80g/3oz dried cranberries,  2 Bramley apples, peeled, cored and grated,  1 tsp ground cinnamon,  25g/1oz demerara sugar,  3 tbsp red wine vinegar,  Salt and pepper
